comparison.description: Determines how the blast resistance of the block should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the blast resistance of the block should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the blast resistance value of the block will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the blast resistance value of the block will be compared to.

type.description:
## Blast Resistance

---


[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/blast_resistance)

Checks the blast resistance value of the block.

Type ID: `origins:blast_resistance`

---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:blast_resistance",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 1200
}
```

This example will check if the blast resistance value of the block is that of an Obsidian block or greater.
